title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
We are seeking a talented Full-Stack Developer (Senior, Junior, Intern) to join our innovative team. Work on Odoo ERP implementations and diverse projects across retail, manufacturing, and restaurants.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
- Collaborate on Odoo ERP implementations, customizing modules and integrations.
- Participate in the full software development lifecycle.
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
- Work with cross-functional teams.

Qualifications:
- Proficient in Python and JavaScript.
- Strong experience with HTML and CSS.
- Familiarity with Odoo ERP is a plus.
- Knowledge of PostgreSQL or other DBMS.
- Experience with Git.
- API integrations (REST, XML-RPC) preferred.
- Knowledge of Linux/Unix.
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Nice to have:
- Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban).
- Mobile app development (Flutter/React Native).

What's great in the job?
- Diverse project experience.
- Collaborative environment.
- Career growth opportunities.
- Impactful work.
- Learning culture.

title: Backend Developer-Node.Js
description:
We are looking for a motivated Node.js & MongoDB Developer.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain backend applications using Node.js
- Build RESTful APIs using Express.js
- Work with async programming (async/await)
- Handle application errors
- Collaborate with the team

Must Have:
- Basic proficiency in Python
- Strong understanding of MongoDB
- Understanding of relational DBs (PostgreSQL preferred)
- Git for version control
- Strong problem-solving attitude

Nice to have:
- Django/Flask or other Python web frameworks
- JavaScript for Odoo frontend
- Linux/Ubuntu, Docker
- ERP concepts

What's in it for you?
- Real world experience
- Certificate of recognition
- Job opportunity for top performers.

title: Flutter Developer
description:
Collaborate with each department to create and deploy disruptive products.

Responsibilities:
- Lead the entire sales cycle
- Achieve monthly sales objectives
- Qualify customer needs
- Negotiate and contract
- Master demos of our software

Must Have:
- Bachelor Degree or Higher
- Passion for software products
- Perfect written English
- Highly creative and autonomous
- Valid work permit for Belgium

Nice to have:
- Experience in writing online content
- Additional languages
- Google Adwords experience
- Strong analytical skills

What's great in the job?
- Great team of smart people
- Friendly and open culture
- No dumb managers, no stupid tools
- No rigid working hours
- Expand your knowledge
- Create content that helps users
- Real responsibilities and challenges.

title: Javascript Developer
description:
We are looking for a dedicated and passionate Javascript Developer.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain backend services using Node.js
- Collaborate with frontend developers
- Build reusable code and libraries
- Optimize applications for speed and scalability
- Implement security and data protection
- Design and implement data storage solutions
- Maintain code documentation and version control

Must Have:
- Strong knowledge of JavaScript (1+ years)
- Node.js experience
- Understanding of async programming
- Basic understanding of front-end (Angular, HTML5, CSS3)
- Strong knowledge of MongoDB
- Familiarity with PostgreSQL
- Proficient with Git
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication skills

title: Python Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Developer.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain Python modules and applications
- Customize existing Python modules
- Design, code, test, debug, and validate software
- Work closely with other developers and product managers
- Provide technical support and training
- Optimize performance
- Ensure quality and reliability
- Document code

Must Have:
- Strong programming skills in Python and JavaScript
- Experience with Python (1+ years)
- Good understanding of PostgreSQL
- Familiarity with front-end (HTML, CSS, XML)
- Experience with Git
- Ability to solve complex problems
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
- Strong communication and teamwork
- Attention to detail

Nice to have:
- Experience with Odoo framework
- Familiarity with Linux/Unix
- Proven experience as an Odoo Developer
- Experience with cloud services

title: Junior Software Developer
description:
Junior Software Developer
Position: Junior Software Developer

Assist in the design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications

title: Software / Website Developer Internship
description:
The Software / Website Development Intern will work on various assigned Software / Website development projects in which they will gain exposure to Software / Website development best practices. This individual will be given the opportunity to be mentored by experienced developers within the team along with leaders across tech and other cross-functional teams.

Qualifications:
- Working towards a Bachelor's degree in a technical field of study associated with Software / Website Engineering
- Demonstrated passion or interest in one or more of our key industries
- Excellent communication skills
- Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills
- An aptitude to learn and adapt quickly in a rapidly changing environment
- Intellectual curiosity and desire to learn new things, techniques, and technologies

Responsibilities:
- As an intern, you will undertake work on a real business project intended to add value to your team as well as provide you with a great learning opportunity
- You will add to our test suites and demonstrate completed stories to our stakeholders and clients
- Collaborate with colleagues in design, product management, and systems architecture to develop solutions and bring great ideas to life

title: Sales and Marketing Internship / Fresh Graduate
description:
We are searching for a committed intern to join our team. The sales operations intern will complete allocated tasks and projects provided by the manager or assigned staff member. As an intern, you should be able to take instruction, but also work unsupervised when required.

Qualifications:
- Strong Microsoft Office data skills especially, Excel (Formulas, Pivot Tables, etc.)
- A high school diploma or general education degree (GED) is required
- College Degree in progress or completed with a major in Business, Marketing, or other relevant degrees
- Excellent customer service, grammar, verbal and writing skills
- Resourceful, results-oriented, and well-organized
- Comfortable performing multi-faceted tasks and projects in conjunction with day-to-day activities with minimal supervision

Sales Operations Intern Responsibilities:
- Working closely with sales staff in completing all tasks
- Good time management skills
- Strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel along with Word and PowerPoint
- Ability to work independently or in a group setting
- Attend all meetings or events held by the sales department or company
- Communicate with sales executives to gain information regarding assigned projects
- Manage deadlines for deliverables

title: ERP Functional Consultant
description:
Join ZalaTech, a vibrant and innovative team, working within an organization that values independence, flexibility and personal growth. We are looking for ERP Functional Consultants to join our team responsible for ERP implementation projects.

Responsibilities:
- Business Analysis
- ERP Project Management
- Customer Support
- Understanding the business workflow
- Configuring business needs in ERP
- Ensuring usability of ERP and usability for client business processes

Challenges:
- Handle ERP implementation in varied Business domains
- Provide support to customers from different Geographies

Must Have:
- Qualification: Bachelor's degree or Masters/PGDM or Equivalent degree
- Experience: 2 years and more
- Excellent command/understanding of ERP modules
- Excellent written and verbal command on English
